scripts.start:watch: (node-sass -w --output-style compressed Common -o Common) & (node-sass -w --output-style compressed Components -o Components) & (node-sass -w --output-style compressed View -o View)
scripts.compile: node-sass --output-style compressed Components -o Components && node-sass --output-style compressed Room -o Room && node-sass --output-style compressed New -o New && node-sass --output-style compressed Backstage -o Backstage
